verses.text: Ach in Diosal, ch'oxeli to malaj in mul. Ochanh walumaloc t'a juntzanh anima malaj elk'och t'a yol sat tik. Colinel t'a heb' naumk'e lolonel yet' t'a heb' chuk sb'eyb'al.
Ach in Diosal, in Kolumal ach, 多tas wal yuj najat tzin ik'canel t'a ichanh? 多Tas wal yuj cusnac in k'ool tzin b'eyeq'ui, tzin yixtan heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin?
Ch'ox a sakil k'inal t'ayin yet' a lolonel te yel, yic wach' ol in sch'ox t'a sb'eal jun tzalan yic ejmelal b'aj cajan ach eq'ui.
Ach in Diosal, ol in k'och t'a altar, ata' ol ach in b'itejnhej yet' te' arpa, yujto a ach tzak' in tzalajk'olal.
多Tas wal yuj schab'axk'e in k'ool? 多Tas yuj somchaj in pensar? Ach in Diosal ayach och yipoc in k'ool, olto wal wach' lolonel t'ayach, in Kolumal, in Diosal aji.
